alert.note: Alert for Clay; Oktibbeha (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued March 30 at 6:00PM CDT until March 30 at 8:00PM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A TORNADO WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 615 PM CDT FOR NORTHEASTERN CHOCTAW...NORTHWESTERN OKTIBBEHA...EASTERN WEBSTER AND SOUTHWESTERN CLAY COUNTIES... At 600 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms capable of producing tornadoes were located along a line extending from near Houlka to near Houston to near Maben, moving northeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...Tornado. SOURCE...Radar indicated rotation. IMPACT...Flying debris will be dangerous to those caught without shelter. Mobile homes will be damaged or destroyed. Damage to roofs, windows, and vehicles will occur. Tree damage is likely. These dangerous storms will be near... Griffith around 615 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by these tornadic storms include Mantee. TORNADO...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN
info.instruction: TAKE COVER NOW! Move to a basement or an interior room on the lowest floor of a sturdy building. Avoid windows. If you are outdoors, in a mobile home, or in a vehicle, move to the closest substantial shelter and protect yourself from flying debris.
